title: LangChain — AI Tool Review
description: LangChain is the most popular open-source LLM framework with 90,000+ stars for building AI agents, RAG systems, and chatbots. LangChain is the most widely adopted framework for building LLM-powered applications. It provides abstractions for chaining LLM calls, RAG, building agents, and managing memory. With 90,000+ GitHub stars, LangChain powers everything from simple chatbots to complex autonomous agents and is considered the standard for LLM application development. Highlights: Largest ecosystem — 90k+ GitHub stars. Supports all major LLMs. RAG and memory built-in. Extensive integrations. Huge community.
